PRO TEST_GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON ; LIKE A UNIT TEST FOR GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON ; READ IN THE TEST FILE AND PRINT THE LAT AND LON TO THE SCREEN CD, CURRENT=c VIIRS_TEST_FILE = c + '/Source/viirs/test/' + 'NPP_VMAE_L1.A2013176.0030.P1_03001.2013176093155.hdf' TEST = GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON(VIIRS_TEST_FILE) IF TEST.LAT[0,0] eq -55.41022 THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'TEST PASSED' ENDIF ELSE BEGIN PRINT, TEST.LAT[0] PRINT, 'TEST FAILED' ENDELSE END
